name: Get posts by searchterms
description:
Add search terms as seed node. 

This preset searches the entire, cross-platform CrowdTangle system of posts (Facebook and Instagram). If you want the data from a specific platform, set the platform parameter. 

Please use a startDate. The collection will be much more quickly when the system only has to search a subset of dates for your data. 

This preset fetches the last 100 posts for your search terms. To see more than 100 posts increase the maximum pages. The API will max out at 10,000 posts. 

The default sortBy Parameter for this preset is date. If you want to have other posts than the first 100 recently published posts, adjust the sortBy Parameter. 

DON'T FORGET: Before you can fetch the data, you must enter your CrowdTangle access token in the corresponding field "access token" for authentication.

See https://github.com/CrowdTangle/API/wiki/Search for more parameter options. 

API Cheatsheet: https://help.crowdtangle.com/en/articles/3443476-api-cheat-sheet
